title: Bug 49536: No Content Returned for URL Access when No Webapps Deployed
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return a HTTP error 404 with an appropriate error message or content.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from the following URL: http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server
4. Verify that the server returns a HTTP error 404 with an appropriate error message or content.
